data.name: AppTitle
data.comment: This is the title of the application

data.name: HelloWorld
data.comment: This is only for development. Remove when done

data.name: QuitMenuText
data.comment: This is the text for the quit command as seen in the menu bar

data.name: QuitToolBarText
data.comment: This is the text for the quit command as seen in the tool bar

data.name: AboutMenuText
data.comment: This is the text for the about command as seen in the menu bar

data.name: AboutToolBarText
data.comment: This is the text for the about command as seen in the tool bar

data.name: PreferencesMenuText
data.comment: This is the text for the preferences command as seen in the menu bar

data.name: PreferencesToolBarText
data.comment: This is the text for the preferences command as seen in the tool bar

data.name: CloseButton
data.comment: Text that appears on form buttons that close a form

data.name: VersionText
data.comment: this is text used to convey the application version to a user
